aboutMe.presentation1: Hello, my name is Valentin HIPPOLYTE, a motivated and dynamic developer with a Master’s degree in Computer Engineering.
aboutMe.presentation2: After three years of apprenticeship at Worldline, where I developed features for international banking clients, I am now looking for a new professional challenge.

description.casa-cal-y-sol: A showcase site for a vacation home in Andalusia with an integrated booking system.
description.ghiblix: An app to discover and manage Ghibli films: add to favorites, track views, and explore films.
description.daily-tracker: A tool to track daily tasks and goals, designed to improve efficiency and productivity.

casa-cal-y-sol.description: Casa Cal y Sol is a showcase website I'm building for my parents, who fulfilled their dream of moving to a white village in Andalusia. The site allows visitors to explore their holiday home, check availability, and book a stay in a warm and authentic atmosphere.

features.1: Development of the site based on a personalized graphic charter
features.4: Multilingual version with translation management (Vue I18n)

casa-cal-y-sol.challenge: Integrating and customizing the Smoobu API to display a synced calendar without using their default widget helped me deepen my understanding of third-party API integration and the importance of user experience in a project aimed at non-tech users.

ghiblix.description: Ghiblix is a Full Stack app I developed for a friend who’s a big Studio Ghibli fan — and for myself to discover its films and track the ones I've already watched. The goal: offer a simple and elegant interface to browse the studio's works, view film details, and mark those you’ve seen.

features.1: Complete list of Studio Ghibli movies, with posters, titles, and summaries
features.2: Ability to mark movies as 'watched' to track your progress
features.3: Detailed movie pages with description, release date, director, etc.
features.4: Sign up / login with JWT to manage a personal profile and save your data

ghiblix.challenge: One of the challenges was managing user state (watched movies) in a secure and persistent way. I implemented JWT authentication and a REST API to let users access their personal watchlist. This project helped me structure a full Full Stack architecture (front, back, DB) and practice a solid Git workflow, even solo.

daily-tracker.description: Daily Tracker is a minimalist app I created to track my daily routines in a quick and simple way. I wanted a lightweight, functional, and pleasant tool — like a digital daily notebook. It's aimed at anyone who wants to keep track of habits without getting lost in too many features.

features.2: Mark habits as completed in one click
features.4: Responsive UI built with Vue.js + Tailwind

daily-tracker.challenge: I strengthened my understanding of JWT authentication and user state management in a Vue.js app, giving me a solid foundation for other projects with auth.
